content.title: Thank You & What’s Next
content.creator:
DAREU
February 28, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We sincerely thank you for your unwavering support throughout our DAREU A70 campaign and we are so grateful for your support in making it all happen.
What’s Next?
Production & Shipping: We’ll keep you updated on production and shipping, so you’ll know when to expect your DAREU A70.
Survey: Look out for a survey in your inbox within the next two weeks. It’ll help us get your DAREU A70 to you.
Thanks again for your trust and excitement. We can’t wait to get the DAREU A70 into your hands!
Best Regards,
DAREU Team
----------------------------------Projects We Love--------------------------------------------
Black Warrior: Cinematic 4K RGB 3D GTV & KTV Laser Projector
Experience stunning visuals and enjoy a cinematic experience at home with the Black Warrior 4K RGB 3D Laser Projector. It offers:
✨ Ultra-clear 4K Resolution: Sharp, detailed image quality for a true-to-life viewing experience.
🌈 RGB 3D Laser Technology: Vivid colors and immersive 3D effects.
🎬 Cinematic HDR: High contrast and wide color gamut for enhanced detail.
🎤 GTV & KTV Entertainment Modes: Optimized audio and video for home theater and karaoke use.
💡 Long-lasting Brightness & Durability: High brightness and long lifespan with RGB laser technology.
🔊 Premium Audio Support: Built-in or compatible high-quality sound for cinema-level audio, with every detail vividly presented.
Black Warrior brings you the future of home entertainment with top-tier visuals and sound! 🌟

content.title: KOL Review Update
content.creator:
DAREU
February 11, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We hope this message finds you well! We are thrilled to share that the Click and Thock has done a comprehensive review of the DAREU A70 Keyboard! If you're curious about the features of our product, be sure to check out his review.
Watch the full review here:
Thank you to Click and Thock for the fantastic review, and each of our backers' continued support. We are looking forward to sharing more updates with you soon!
Best Regards,
DAREU Team

content.title: 🎉100% Funded & 🥰Join Our Referral Program for Cash Back!
content.creator:
DAREU
February 6, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We’re thrilled to announce that DAREU A70 Maestro Keyboard has reached 100% funding! 🎉
We are now one step closer to making this innovative keyboard a reality. We are truly grateful for the incredible support from each one of our backers.
🥰Join our referral program!
Help us make our community even stronger by joining our referral program on Kickbooster. You can earn cash back for each referral by following these two simple steps:
Click the button and register as a Booster.
Share your unique Booster link on your Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Website, or anywhere you like!
For more details, visit our Kickbooster page.
Thank you once again for your incredible support! Stay tuned for more exciting updates!
Best Regards,
DAREU Team
-------------------------------------Project We Love-------------------------------------------
ZoomYao Max:Compact Yet Powerful 2-in-1 Air Blaster & Vacuum
🌟 Compact Design: Lightweight and compact, easy to carry and store, making it perfect for various environments such as home, office desks, or cars.
💪 Powerful Performance: Combines air blasting and vacuum functions, providing an efficient cleaning experience.
🔄 2-in-1 Functionality: One product that meets both air blasting and vacuuming needs, saving time and effort.
🌍 Versatile Use: Easily handles dust on desktops, between keyboard keys, or debris inside your car.
🖱️  Easy to Use: Simple operation, allowing users to start quickly without complex settings.
⚡ Energy Efficient: The powerful vacuuming and air blasting functions work together to improve cleaning efficiency while saving energy.
